name: app
description: A comprehensive portal showcasing a collection of AI-powered web tools and utilities. This is the main landing page that provides access to various AI applications and tools.

scripts.test: npm run test:e2e && npm run test:lighthouse
scripts.copy:assets: cp index.html dist/ && cp tools.json dist/ && cp critical.css dist/ && cp site.webmanifest dist/ && cp sw.js dist/ && cp robots.txt dist/ && cp sitemap.xml dist/ && cp CNAME dist/
scripts.copy:fontawesome: mkdir -p dist/vendor/fontawesome/css dist/vendor/fontawesome/webfonts && cp node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css dist/vendor/fontawesome/css/ && cp -r node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts/* dist/vendor/fontawesome/webfonts/
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/js && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run copy:assets && npm run copy:fontawesome
